sn36.28:1.3: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn36.28:1.4: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va imasam tissannam vedananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajananti …pe…
sn36.28:1.5: pajananti …pe… sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti”ti.
